body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

Currently there is no out of the box Sentry support. To log errors to Sentry in activities, an `ActivityInboundCallsInterceptor` needs to be implemented.

### Describe the solution you'd like

Some type of integration that allows us to easily add Sentry support

### Additional context

<!-- Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. -->

comments.body: We have no plan to add out-of-the-box support for Sentry in the foreseeable future, and users can easily do that themselves by registering a custom logger.

title: [Feature Request] Sentry integration
